attributes.comment:
Please reconsider raising the fee for the I-600A Petition to Classify Orphan as an
Immediate Relative fee from $545 to $670. International adoption is already a very
expensive process and many families have to renew their petition one or two times
paying the original amount again. It often takes much longer than 18 months to
finalize an international adoption and the I-600A approval is only good for that
long. If it is imperative to raise the fee, please consider increasing the time
between renewals or charging a lower renewal fee instead of the original fee all
over again.

Thank you for your consideration,
Carla Lewter
Adoptive Mother-to-be of a daughter from China

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Carla L. Lewter
